images.description: SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy IC 312, which turns out to be the correct NGC 1265, also showing PGC 12287, which had been misidentified as NGC 1265
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy IC 312, which turns out to be the correct NGC 1265
SDSS image of region near elliptical galaxy PGC 12287, which has long been misidentified as NGC 1265
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 12287, which has long been misidentified as NGC 1265
